name: test_e2e_with_logs[036_SQLI_BLIND_010]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BLIND_010` |
| **Name** | Password length discovery via timing |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT CASE WHEN (LENGTH(password))>10 THEN SLEEP(5) ELSE 1 END) FROM users WHERE username='admin' --`
- **Encoded**: `'%20AND%20(SELECT%20CASE%20WHEN%20(LENGTH(password))%3E10%20THEN%20SLEEP(5)%20ELSE%201%20END)%20FROM%20users%20WHERE%20username%3D'admin'%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~56000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:55:03.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_010-1772193303140-kilkn9 pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_010 uri=/?q='%20AND%20(SELECT%20CASE%20WHEN%20(LENGTH(password))%3E10%20THEN%20SLEEP(5)%20ELSE%201%20END)%20FROM%20users%20WHERE%20username%3D'admin'%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_010-1772193303140-kilkn9 pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_010 uri=/?q='%20AND%20(SELECT%20CASE%20WHEN%20(LENGTH(password))%3E10%20THEN%20SLEEP(5)%20ELSE%201%20END)%20FROM%20users%20WHERE%20username%3D'admin'%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
11:55:03.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_010-1772193303140-kilkn9 pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_010 uri=/?q='%20AND%20(SELECT%20CASE%20WHEN%20(LENGTH(password))%3E10%20THEN%20SLEEP(5)%20ELSE%201%20END)%20FROM%20users%20WHERE%20username%3D'admin'%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
